articles.title: More than 110,000 Australians are expected to be laid off when JobKeeper ends in three weeks. Here's which jobs are considered 'high risk'. - Business Insider Australia
articles.description: Commonwealth Bank economists are forecasting major job losses when the government terminates the JobKeeper program at the end of the month.
articles.content:
• There are to be an estimated 110,000 job losses when the JobKeeper wage subsidy finishes at the end of March.
